bibl.title: A new date for the Oxyrhynchite epitome of the Gnomon of the Idios Logos (P. Oxy. XLII 3014)
bibl.seg: Anna Dolganov, A new date for the Oxyrhynchite epitome of the Gnomon of the Idios Logos (P. Oxy. XLII 3014).

Redating the Oxyrhynchite epitome of the Gnomon [to the reign of Antoninus Pius]. - New text and translation of the Oxyrhynchite epitome (P. Oxy. XLII, 3014) and the corresponding text of the Arsinoite epitome (B.G.U. V, 1210, ll. 99-116). - Commentary to P. Oxy. XLII, 3014. - Commentary to B.G.U. V, 1210, ll. 99-116. - Conclusion.
bibl.note: Redating the Oxyrhynchite epitome of the Gnomon [to the reign of Antoninus Pius]. - New text and translation of the Oxyrhynchite epitome (P. Oxy. XLII, 3014) and the corresponding text of the Arsinoite epitome (B.G.U. V, 1210, ll. 99-116). - Commentary to P. Oxy. XLII, 3014. - Commentary to B.G.U. V, 1210, ll. 99-116. - Conclusion.
